data_projects.name: Stock-market-analysis
data_projects.description: Implement sentiment analysis on YT comments using Kafka for streaming, the YT API for fetching data, Pandas for transformation, Matplotlib for visualization, and TextBlob for sentiment analysis.

data_projects.name: YT Cmt Sentiment Analysis
data_projects.description: Implement Kafka for real-time streaming, and utilize Pandas for data structuring to simulate real-time stock variation trends of a particular brand.

web_projects.name: Shoppy : Ecommerce App
web_projects.description: Shoppy is a full-stack eCommerce app built with Django and React, featuring Django Rest Framework for RESTful APIs, JWT authentication, and PayPal API integration for payments.

web_projects.name: Inventory Mgmt System
web_projects.description: Built inventory management system using Django, React, Redux with JWT authentication, filtering, searching, and seamless back-end and front-end integration.

web_projects.name: College Robotics Club
web_projects.description: Completely Responsive, MUI and Redux-powered website for the institution's robotics society, featuring DRF backend implementation. Official platform, all device-friendly.

web_projects.name: Food Receipe App
web_projects.description: A full-stack Food Recipe App for seamless recipe exploration, user engagement, and personalized profiles.Implemented advanced filtering and searching functionality, reducing recipe discovery time by 50%

android_projects.name: Student-Management-App
android_projects.description: The app utilizes Firebase to enable admin control over department info, notices, and interface, while allowing authenticated students access to notices, timetables, & dept details.

android_projects.name: Blood-Donation App
android_projects.description: An inclusive blood donation app for donors and patients. Donors register their details, while patients access a list of available donors for easy communication.

android_projects.name: Chat App
android_projects.description: A Kotlin and XML-based chat application with Firebase integration, enabling users to create unique accounts, facilitating chat between any two users. Includes session management.

android_projects.name: ASJ-NGO APP
android_projects.description: Built the entire Backend and contributed to frontend. The App asks users to register giving them options to log in as an Organizer or a Volunteer
